replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ayaya 于 2013-12-28 11:51 编辑 

Mozart:
Requim
Eine kleine nachtmusik 1,2,3,4
Turkish march
Symphony No.40 mvt. 1

Beethoven:
Symphony No.3 mvt. 2
Symphony No.5 mvt. 1 (命运交响曲)
Symphony No.7 mvt. 2
Symphony No.9 mvt. 1, 2 4(欢乐颂)
Piano sonata No.13 Op8
Piano sonata No.14 (月光)

Strauss(1st and 2nd):
Emperor Waltz
Radetzky March
The Blue Danube
Chit-chat
Voices of Spring
Viennese Blood
Light Blood
Polka Schnell

Tchaikovsky:
Violin concerto
1812 overture 
Nutcracker- Sugar Plum Fairies
Nutcracker- Waltz of the Flowers
Swan Lake- Dance of the swan
Swan Lake- Scene from Act 2

Sibelius:
Symphony No.5
Symphony No.7

Rimsky-Korsakov: 
Scheherazade

Dvořák: 
Symphony No. 9 <From The New World>

Stravinsky: 
The Firebird

Debussy:
La mer
Dance macabre

没有都写出来，够你听一段时间了
